summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3342, for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Brooklyn Addition being the alley between Brooklyn Avenue and 14th Avenue Northeast, from East 42nd Street to East 43rd Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41251 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
